trans-unit.resname: MKM·1 | Case of the Shattered Pact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case of the Shattered Pact
trans-unit.target: 十会碎盟案

trans-unit.resname: MKM·1 | Case of the Shattered Pact | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When this Case enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当此案件进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·1 | Case of the Shattered Pact | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: To solve — There are five colors among permanents you control. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)
trans-unit.target: 侦办～由你操控之永久物中包括的颜色有五种。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·1 | Case of the Shattered Pact | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Solved — At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains flying, double strike, and vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 侦结～在你回合的战斗开始时，目标由你操控的生物获得飞行、连击与警戒异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·2 | Absolving Lammasu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Absolving Lammasu
trans-unit.target: 赦罪拉玛苏

trans-unit.resname: MKM·2 | Absolving Lammasu | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·2 | Absolving Lammasu | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Absolving Lammasu enters the battlefield, all suspected creatures are no longer suspected.
trans-unit.target: 当赦罪拉玛苏进战场时，所有已遭疑的生物不再遭疑。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·2 | Absolving Lammasu | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Absolving Lammasu dies, you gain 3 life and suspect up to one target creature an opponent controls. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 当赦罪拉玛苏死去时，你获得3点生命且怀疑至多一个目标由对手操控的生物。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·3 | Assemble the Players | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assemble the Players
trans-unit.target: 召集选手

trans-unit.resname: MKM·3 | Assemble the Players | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·3 | Assemble the Players | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may cast a creature spell with power 2 or less from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 限每回合一次，你可以从你牌库顶施放力量等于或小于2的生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·3 | Assemble the Players | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All will soon be made clear, but I can give you this: our killer is here with us, in this very room."\n—Alquist Proft
trans-unit.target: 「一切很快就会真相大白，不过我现在就能跟你们说：凶手就在我们身边，就在这间屋内。」 ～阿奎斯波费

trans-unit.resname: MKM·4 | Aurelia's Vindicator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aurelia's Vindicator
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞梨的雪恨使

trans-unit.resname: MKM·4 | Aurelia's Vindicator | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink, ward {2}
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命，守护{2}

trans-unit.resname: MKM·4 | Aurelia's Vindicator | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Disguise {X}{3}{W}

trans-unit.resname: MKM·4 | Aurelia's Vindicator | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Aurelia's Vindicator is turned face up, exile up to X other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 当欧瑞梨的雪恨使翻回正面时，将若干其他目标战场上的生物和／或坟墓场中的生物牌从该处放逐，上述数量至多为X。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·4 | Aurelia's Vindicator | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: When Aurelia's Vindicator leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 当欧瑞梨的雪恨使离开战场时，将所放逐的牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·5 | Auspicious Arrival | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Auspicious Arrival
trans-unit.target: 朗报到来

trans-unit.resname: MKM·5 | Auspicious Arrival | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·5 | Auspicious Arrival | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Proft brushed past the guards and introduced himself as "the great Detective Proft" without a hint of irony, then identified the culprit within minutes.
trans-unit.target: 波费挤过守卫，不苟言笑地报出自己「名侦探波费」名头，然后不出几分钟就找出了凶手。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·6 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call a Surprise Witness
trans-unit.target: 突召人证

trans-unit.resname: MKM·6 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a flying counter on it. It's a Spirit in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。在其上放置一个飞行指示物。它额外具有精怪此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·6 | Call a Surprise Witness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why would a little thing like death stop me from running the Syndicate? I'm going to be here for a long, long time."
trans-unit.target: 「死亡这种小事，又怎能阻止我继续统领欧佐夫集团？我会在这个位置待上很久、很久。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7 | Case File Auditor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case File Auditor
trans-unit.target: 案宗审计员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7 | Case File Auditor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Case File Auditor enters the battlefield and whenever you solve a Case, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当案宗审计员进战场或每当你侦办一个案件时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张结界牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7 | Case File Auditor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast Case spells.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来施放案件咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7† | Case File Auditor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case File Auditor
trans-unit.target: 案宗审计员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7† | Case File Auditor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Case File Auditor enters the battlefield and whenever you solve a Case, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当案宗审计员进战场或每当你侦办一个案件时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张结界牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·7† | Case File Auditor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast Case spells.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来施放案件咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case of the Gateway Express
trans-unit.target: 门前快车案

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When this Case enters the battlefield, choose target creature you don't control. Each creature you control deals 1 damage to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 当此案件进战场时，选择目标不由你操控的生物。每个由你操控的生物各对该生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: To solve — Three or more creatures attacked this turn. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)
trans-unit.target: 侦办～本回合中有三个或更多生物攻击过。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·8 | Case of the Gateway Express | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Solved — Creatures you control get +1/+0.
trans-unit.target: 侦结～由你操控的生物得+1/+0。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·9 | Case of the Pilfered Proof | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case of the Pilfered Proof
trans-unit.target: 证据遭窃案

trans-unit.resname: MKM·9 | Case of the Pilfered Proof | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Detective enters the battlefield under your control and whenever a Detective you control is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个侦探在你操控下进战场和每当一个由你操控的侦探翻回正面时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·9 | Case of the Pilfered Proof | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: To solve — You control three or more Detectives. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)
trans-unit.target: 侦办～你操控三个或更多侦探。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·9 | Case of the Pilfered Proof | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Solved — If one or more tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus a Clue token are created instead. (It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 侦结～如果将在你的操控下派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为派出该些衍生物加上一个线索衍生物。（它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·10 | Case of the Uneaten Feast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case of the Uneaten Feast
trans-unit.target: 未动盛宴案

trans-unit.resname: MKM·10 | Case of the Uneaten Feast | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·10 | Case of the Uneaten Feast | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: To solve — You've gained 5 or more life this turn. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)
trans-unit.target: 侦办～你本回合中获得过5点或更多生命。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·10 | Case of the Uneaten Feast | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Solved — Sacrifice this Case: Creature cards in your graveyard gain "You may cast this card from your graveyard" until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 侦结～牺牲此案件：你坟墓场中的生物牌获得「你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌」直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·11 | Defenestrated Phantom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Defenestrated Phantom
trans-unit.target: 遗窗幽魅

trans-unit.resname: MKM·11 | Defenestrated Phantom | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·11 | Defenestrated Phantom | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Disguise {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{4}{W}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·11 | Defenestrated Phantom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Never parley near high windows."\n—Teysa
trans-unit.target: 「不要在高窗边上争论不休。」 ～泰莎

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Delney, Streetwise Lookout
trans-unit.target: 街头监哨德雷尼

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control with power 2 or less can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物不能被力量等于或大于3的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an ability of a creature you control with power 2 or less triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控且力量等于或小于2之生物的异能触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not a matter of what I know. It's a matter of making it worth my while to tell you."
trans-unit.target: 「我知道什么不重要。是不是值得花时间跟你说才重要。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doorkeeper Thrull
trans-unit.target: 索尔兽门卫

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Artifacts and creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
trans-unit.target: 进战场的神器和生物不会触发异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Parties at Karlov Manor are strictly invitation only.
trans-unit.target: 卡洛夫庄园的宴会都是非请勿进，且严格执行。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·14 | Due Diligence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Due Diligence
trans-unit.target: 尽心尽责

trans-unit.resname: MKM·14 | Due Diligence | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: MKM·14 | Due Diligence | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Due Diligence enters the battlefield, target creature you control other than enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当尽心尽责进战场时，直到回合结束，目标所结附生物以外由你操控的生物得+2/+2且获得警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·14 | Due Diligence | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Essence of Antiquity
trans-unit.target: 古迹菁华

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Disguise {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{2}{W}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Essence of Antiquity is turned face up, creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. Untap them.
trans-unit.target: 当古迹菁华翻回正面时，由你操控的生物获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。将它们重置。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In a city as old as Ravnica, history takes on a life of its own—even when you least expect it.
trans-unit.target: 像拉尼卡这样年头悠久的城市，历史都能活出真我～甚至是在你最不希望看到的时候。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·16 | Forum Familiar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forum Familiar
trans-unit.target: 法院佣兽

trans-unit.resname: MKM·16 | Forum Familiar | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Disguise {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{1}{W}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·16 | Forum Familiar | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Forum Familiar is turned face up, return another target permanent you control to its owner's hand and put a +1/+1 counter on Forum Familiar.
trans-unit.target: 当法院佣兽翻回正面时，将另一个目标由你操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上，并在法院佣兽上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·17 | Griffnaut Tracker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Griffnaut Tracker
trans-unit.target: 驭鹫追迹人

trans-unit.resname: MKM·17 | Griffnaut Tracker | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·17 | Griffnaut Tracker | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Griffnaut Tracker enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当驭鹫追迹人进战场时，将至多两张目标在同一坟墓场中的牌从该处放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·17 | Griffnaut Tracker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The desperate will tread unexpected paths. Be prepared to follow."\n—Tam Sennic, Ezrim's second-in-command
trans-unit.target: 「亡命之徒逃跑时会慌不择路。时刻做好准备追上去。」 ～伊泽霖副手坦姆森尼克

trans-unit.resname: MKM·18 | Haazda Vigilante | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Haazda Vigilante
trans-unit.target: 哈兹达警卫

trans-unit.resname: MKM·18 | Haazda Vigilante | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Haazda Vigilante enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with power 2 or less.
trans-unit.target: 每当哈兹达警卫进战场或攻击时，在目标由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·18 | Haazda Vigilante | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Call the Boros if you want. While they figure out if they have enough people to send a patrol, I'll be out clobbering the lowlifes who robbed you."
trans-unit.target: 「你要报官找波洛斯就去报。等他们还在研究是否有人手出队巡逻时，我早就已经把那些抢劫你的混蛋打得满地找牙了。」

trans-unit.target: 内部线民

trans-unit.resname: MKM·19 | Inside Source | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target Detective you control gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{tap}：直到回合结束，目标由你操控的侦探得+2/+0且获得警戒异能。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·19 | Inside Source | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I was never here."
trans-unit.target: 「我没来过。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Karlov Watchdog
trans-unit.target: 卡洛夫看守犬

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Permanents your opponents control can't be turned face up during your turn.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控之永久物于你的回合中不能翻回正面。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你以三个或更多生物攻击时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Teysa trusts only those for whom money has no meaning.
trans-unit.target: 泰莎只信任钱财对其了无意义者。

trans-unit.target: 克瓦兽腿肉骨

trans-unit.resname: MKM·21 | Krovod Haunch | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·21 | Krovod Haunch | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krovod Haunch: You gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{tap}，牺牲克瓦兽腿肉骨：你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·21 | Krovod Haunch | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Krovod Haunch is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, create two 1/1 white Dog creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·23 | Makeshift Binding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Kaya clung to the cords of the barrier ward with all her might, trapping the thrashing dryad like a fly in a spider's web.
trans-unit.target: 卡娅牢牢牵紧魔法绳索，将愤怒出击的树灵困在屏障结界之中，令其犹如落入蛛网的飞蝇一般动弹不得。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·24 | Marketwatch Phantom | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个力量等于或小于2的生物在你操控下进战场时，巡市幽魅获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·24 | Marketwatch Phantom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's amazing how efficient a detective you can be when you're not slowed down by things like self-preservation or walls."
trans-unit.target: 「在不用考虑自身安危，免受墙壁阻挡之后，瞧瞧你这个侦探多能干。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·27 | No Witnesses | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When cunning fails, there's always violence.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·28 | Not on My Watch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You know, Proft, I've done a lot of questionable things in my life, but helping a pompous detective save lives is a new low, even for me."
trans-unit.target: 「波费，你知道吗，虽然我这辈子已经干过许多亏心事，但帮一位自大侦探救人性命，就连我都觉得很没面子。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·29 | Novice Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If the perfect evidence appears at your feet, your first task is to rule out misdirection."\n—The Ravnican Agency of Magicological Investigations handbook

trans-unit.resname: MKM·30 | On the Job | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For all their differences, Kaya, Kellan, and Agrus Kos agreed on one thing: none of them would rest until Teysa's murderer was brought to justice.

Create a 0/0 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying, then put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card put into your graveyard this way.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·68 | Projektor Inspector | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Projektor Inspector or another Detective enters the battlefield under your control and whenever a Detective you control is turned face up, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当映射镜巡检员或另一个侦探在你操控下进战场和每当一个由你操控的侦探翻回正面时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·68 | Projektor Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Bring up the particulars from yesterday's altercation, and enhance."
trans-unit.target: 「调出昨日争执的细节，并放清楚些。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reasonable Doubt
trans-unit.target: 合理疑团

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Suspect up to one target creature. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 怀疑至多一个目标生物。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Merle had the motive, but Blovinac was the one caught with the murder weapon. And who was the seven-foot-tall hooded figure? This case is a mess!"
trans-unit.target: 「虽然默雷有动机，但被逮时手握凶器的是牛维亚。那个身高七尺戴着兜帽的人影又是谁？这案子一整个就是团乱麻！」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·70 | Reenact the Crime | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reenact the Crime
trans-unit.target: 重现罪行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·70 | Reenact the Crime | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target nonland card in a graveyard that was put there from anywhere this turn. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标在坟墓场中的非地牌，且须为本回合中从任何区域置入该处者。将它复制。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·70 | Reenact the Crime | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At Proft's command, an ethereal model of the ransacked workshop sprang into being, every detail perfectly recreated. He'd missed something—he knew it—but what?
trans-unit.target: 波费大手一挥，遭劫工作室的虚像模型便跃然眼前，每处细节都已完美还原。但他还是漏了点东西～他自己也知道这一点～但漏了什么呢？

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Steamcore Scholar
trans-unit.target: 蒸气核学者

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Steamcore Scholar enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card or a creature card with flying.
trans-unit.target: 当蒸气核学者进战场时，抓两张牌。然后除非你弃一张瞬间或法术牌或一张具飞行异能的生物牌，否则弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hm. That's weird."
trans-unit.target: 「嗯。真奇怪啊。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·72 | Sudden Setback | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sudden Setback
trans-unit.target: 突发挫败

trans-unit.resname: MKM·72 | Sudden Setback | Card Text
trans-unit.source: The owner of target spell or nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
trans-unit.target: 目标咒语或非地永久物的拥有者将它置于其牌库顶或牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·72 | Sudden Setback | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look, buddy, you're not in trouble. I just wanna ask you a questio—"
trans-unit.target: 「听我说，兄弟，你没惹上麻烦。我只是想问你个问～」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·72† | Sudden Setback | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sudden Setback
trans-unit.target: 突发挫败

trans-unit.resname: MKM·72† | Sudden Setback | Card Text

trans-unit.source: "Look, buddy, you're not in trouble. I just wanna ask you a questio—"
trans-unit.target: 「听我说，兄弟，你没惹上麻烦。我只是想问你个问～」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·73 | Surveillance Monitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Surveillance Monitor
trans-unit.target: 布控监视员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·73 | Surveillance Monitor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Surveillance Monitor enters the battlefield, you may collect evidence 4. (Exile cards with total mana value 4 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当布控监视员进战场时，你可以搜证4。（从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到4或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·73 | Surveillance Monitor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you collect evidence, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你搜证时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·73 | Surveillance Monitor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Thopters don't take breaks, and neither does he.
trans-unit.target: 振翼机从不休息，他也一样。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·73† | Surveillance Monitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Surveillance Monitor
trans-unit.target: 布控监视员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·74 | Unauthorized Exit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unauthorized Exit
trans-unit.target: 擅自脱逃

trans-unit.resname: MKM·74 | Unauthorized Exit | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。刺探1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·74 | Unauthorized Exit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Proft had never been a by-the-book investigator, but even he never expected to find himself breaking a notorious assassin out of a maximum-security Azorius holding cell.
trans-unit.target: 波费从来就不是个照着常理出牌的探员，不过他也从未想过自己有一天会深入戒备森严的俄佐立拘留室，帮助恶名杀手逃出生天。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·75 | Agency Coroner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agency Coroner
trans-unit.target: 魔调局验尸官

trans-unit.resname: MKM·75 | Agency Coroner | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. If the sacrificed creature was suspected, draw two cards instead.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，牺牲另一个生物：抓一张牌。如果所牺牲的生物已遭疑，则改为抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·75 | Agency Coroner | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, cause of death seems pretty straightforward, but what else can you tell me, friend?"
trans-unit.target: 「嗯，死因看起来很明显，但你还能告诉我些什么呢，朋友？」

trans-unit.target: 伪装{4}{B}{B}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may collect evidence 6.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·83 | Deadly Cover-Up | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. If evidence was collected, exile a card from an opponent's graveyard. Then search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。如果已搜证，则从对手的坟墓场中放逐一张牌。然后从其拥有者的坟墓场、手牌及牌库中搜寻任意数量具该名称的牌，并将它们放逐。该牌手洗牌，然后每以此法从其手上放逐一张牌，其便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·86 | Homicide Investigator | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, investigate. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，探查。此异能每回合只会触发一次。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·86 | Homicide Investigator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In her line of work, the dead are often better sources than the living.
trans-unit.target: 在她这行，死者给出的情报比生者更可靠。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·88 | Illicit Masquerade | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.source: It Doesn't Add Up
trans-unit.target: 事理不通

trans-unit.resname: MKM·89 | It Doesn't Add Up | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Suspect it. (It has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。怀疑它。（它具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·89 | It Doesn't Add Up | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Etrata had committed dozens of murders, all of which she recalled in perfect, loving detail. But no matter how hard she tried, she couldn't remember killing Zegana.
trans-unit.target: 艾庄塔干过十多票谋杀，每次细节她都能记得清清楚楚。但就是洁加娜这桩案子，她无论怎样试着回想，都没有印象自己动过手。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·90 | Lead Pipe | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MKM·90 | Lead Pipe | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: {2}，牺牲铅管：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·90 | Lead Pipe | Card Text: Paragraph 4

trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.target: {2}{B}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐空乏旁观客：派出两个已横置的1/1黑色，具飞行异能的蝙蝠衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·91 | Leering Onlooker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ooh, this one does look nasty. Maybe they'll send Proft!"
trans-unit.target: 「哦哦，这桩案子太恶劣了。或许他们会派波费来！」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·92 | Long Goodbye | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MKM·92 | Long Goodbye | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·92 | Long Goodbye | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the days grew longer, so did the list of missing persons.
trans-unit.target: 随着日子一天天过去，失踪人员的名字也在一个个增加。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·93 | Macabre Reconstruction | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 如果本回合中有生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·93 | Macabre Reconstruction | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·93 | Macabre Reconstruction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Eyewitness testimony, coming right up! Just let me finish regenerating their eyes."\n—Nelo, Agency coroner
trans-unit.target: 「下一个就轮到目击证人出庭作证了！让我先把他的眼睛重生出来。」 ～魔调局验尸官涅洛

trans-unit.resname: MKM·94 | Massacre Girl, Known Killer | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有干枯异能。（它们会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·94 | Massacre Girl, Known Killer | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，若其防御力小于1，则你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·94 | Massacre Girl, Known Killer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "'Did I do it?' You'll have to be more specific."
trans-unit.target: 「『这是我干的吗？』你得具体说是哪件事。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·95 | Murder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murder
trans-unit.target: 谋杀

trans-unit.resname: MKM·95 | Murder | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·95 | Murder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Laughter and conversation trailed off as the revelers gathered around Zegana's body. Three things quickly became clear: it was a murder, the killer was likely among them, and Teysa's party was definitely over.
trans-unit.target: 随着狂欢人群聚拢在洁加娜遗体周围，欢声笑语逐渐止歇。大家很快就弄清楚了三件事：这是桩谋杀案；凶手就在众人之间；泰莎的派对当真结束了。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·96 | Nightdrinker Moroii | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nightdrinker Moroii
trans-unit.target: 夜饮莫洛伊

trans-unit.resname: MKM·96 | Nightdrinker Moroii | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Disguise {B}{B} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{B}{B}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·97 | Outrageous Robbery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Outrageous Robbery
trans-unit.target: 骇人劫案

trans-unit.resname: MKM·97 | Outrageous Robbery | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library face down. You may look at and play those cards for as long as they remain exiled. If you cast a spell this way, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手牌面朝下地放逐其牌库顶的X张牌。于这些牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并使用它们。如果你以此法施放咒语，则你可以将法术力视同任意种类的法术力来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·97 | Outrageous Robbery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you can't erase your own trail, leave as many false ones as possible."\n—Etrata
trans-unit.target: 「如果你抹不掉自己的踪迹，那就尽可能多留一些假的痕迹。」 ～艾庄塔

trans-unit.resname: MKM·98 | Persuasive Interrogators | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 诱导诘问者

trans-unit.resname: MKM·98 | Persuasive Interrogators | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 当诱导诘问者进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·98 | Persuasive Interrogators | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, target opponent gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个线索时，目标对手得到两个中毒指示物。（具有十个或更多中毒指示物的牌手会输掉这盘游戏。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·99 | Polygraph Orb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Polygraph Orb
trans-unit.target: 测谎法球

trans-unit.resname: MKM·99 | Polygraph Orb | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Polygraph Orb enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当测谎法球进战场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中两张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·99 | Polygraph Orb | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Collect evidence 3: Each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a creature. (To collect evidence 3, exile cards with total mana value 3 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {2}，{tap}，搜证3：对每位对手而言，除非其弃一张牌或牺牲一个生物，否则失去3点生命。（搜证3的流程，是从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到3或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·100 | Presumed Dead | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 认定死亡

trans-unit.resname: MKM·100 | Presumed Dead | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control and suspect it." (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+0且获得「当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场并怀疑它。」（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·100 | Presumed Dead | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Corpses are pulled from the undercity canals every day. They'll assume one's mine."
trans-unit.target: 「地底城运河里每天都会捞起新尸体。他们会把其中某具当成我的。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·101 | Repeat Offender | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Repeat Offender
trans-unit.target: 累犯恶徒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·101 | Repeat Offender | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}: If Repeat Offender is suspected, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Otherwise, suspect it. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}：如果累犯恶徒已遭疑，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若否，则怀疑它。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·101 | Repeat Offender | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Blasted sketch artist did too good a job. Looks like it's time for me to lie low for a little while."
trans-unit.target: 「这该死的素描画师画得也太像。我得低调一小段时间了。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·102 | Rot Farm Mortipede | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rot Farm Mortipede
trans-unit.target: 腐尸农场杀生虫

trans-unit.resname: MKM·102 | Rot Farm Mortipede | Card Text

trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，直到回合结束，腐尸农场杀生虫得+1/+0且获得威慑与系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·102 | Rot Farm Mortipede | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every week, the necropsy lab's unclaimed bodies are transferred to the Golgari for "recycling."
trans-unit.target: 验尸房每周都会把其中无人认领的遗体转交给葛加理来「回收」。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·103 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Slice from the Shadows
trans-unit.target: 暗中杀出

trans-unit.resname: MKM·103 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。（包括不能被守护异能反击。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·103 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·103 | Slice from the Shadows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Proft has been poking his nose where it doesn't belong. I want him out of the way."\n—Judith, to Massacre Girl
trans-unit.target: 「波费最近的手伸得有些长。我想让他少管闲事。」 ～裘蒂丝叮嘱杀戮女郎

trans-unit.resname: MKM·104 | Slimy Dualleech | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Slimy Dualleech
trans-unit.target: 泥泞双头蛭

trans-unit.resname: MKM·104 | Slimy Dualleech | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control with power 2 or less gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物得+1/+0且获得死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·104 | Slimy Dualleech | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Isn't it gorgeous? It's my most efficient corpse eliminator! One head bites while the other chews."\n—Glogus, Golgari leechbreeder
trans-unit.target: 「厉害吧？它是我最高效的毁尸怪！一个脑袋咬，一个脑袋嚼。」 ～葛加理育蛭人格噶斯

trans-unit.resname: MKM·105 | Snarling Gorehound | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Snarling Gorehound
trans-unit.target: 咆哮血腥猎犬

trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: MKM·105 | Snarling Gorehound | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个力量等于或小于2的生物在你操控下进战场时，刺探1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将其置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·105 | Snarling Gorehound | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'd offer your dog a treat, but I'm afraid I don't have any appendages to spare."\n—Alquist Proft, to Judith
trans-unit.target: 「我真的很想喂喂你的狗，但可惜我没带多余的器官。」 ～阿奎斯波费告诉裘蒂丝

trans-unit.resname: MKM·106 | Soul Enervation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soul Enervation
trans-unit.target: 灵魂衰弱

trans-unit.resname: MKM·106 | Soul Enervation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: MKM·106 | Soul Enervation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Soul Enervation enters the battlefield, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当灵魂衰弱进战场时，目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·106 | Soul Enervation | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·106 | Soul Enervation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Judith's plan was close to fruition. She couldn't have Agrus get in the way.
trans-unit.target: 裘蒂丝的计划就快大功告成。这时可不能让阿固寇斯坏了好事。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·107 | Toxin Analysis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Toxin Analysis
trans-unit.target: 毒理分析

trans-unit.resname: MKM·107 | Toxin Analysis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得死触与系命异能直到回合结束。探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·107 | Toxin Analysis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Poison this deadly is only used by the Ochran. Either the Golgari are behind this, or someone wants us to think they are."
trans-unit.target: 「只有瓯坎的人才会用上这般猛烈的毒药。要么这就是葛加理干的，要么是有人想让我们以为是他们干的。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·108 | Undercity Eliminator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Undercity Eliminator
trans-unit.target: 地底城索命客

trans-unit.resname: MKM·108 | Undercity Eliminator | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Undercity Eliminator enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. When you do, exile target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当地底城索命客进战场时，你可以牺牲一个神器或生物。当你如此作时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·108 | Undercity Eliminator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With their guild shunned for opening the doors to Phyrexia, some among the Golgari embraced their status as pariahs and took out their bitterness on all who crossed their paths.
trans-unit.target: 葛加理由于当初向非瑞克西亚打开门户，现在公会声望每况日下；其间部分成员也接受了最底层的身份，将一切苦楚都宣泄在不小心碰到的路人身上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·109 | Unscrupulous Agent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unscrupulous Agent
trans-unit.target: 无度密探

trans-unit.resname: MKM·109 | Unscrupulous Agent | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Unscrupulous Agent enters the battlefield, target opponent exiles a card from their hand.
trans-unit.target: 当无度密探进战场时，目标对手从其手上放逐一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·109 | Unscrupulous Agent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Obtaining evidence through the "proper" channels can take weeks of paperwork. Sometimes justice just can't wait.
trans-unit.target: 透过「正规」渠道取得证据得花上数周时间来走书面流程。有时正义等不了这么久。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·110 | Vein Ripper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vein Ripper
trans-unit.target: 血脉开膛手

trans-unit.resname: MKM·110 | Vein Ripper | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Ward— Sacrifice a creature. Whenever a creature dies, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 守护～牺牲一个生物。 每当一个生物死去时，目标对手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·110 | Vein Ripper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'm afraid your investigation has reached a dead end."
trans-unit.target: 「恐怕你的调查已经走到了死路。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·111 | Anzrag's Rampage | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 狼藉花园案

trans-unit.resname: MKM·156 | Case of the Trampled Garden | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When this Case enters the battlefield, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 当此案件进战场时，将两个+1/+1指示物分配给一个或两个目标由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·156 | Case of the Trampled Garden | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: To solve — Creatures you control have total power 8 or greater. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)
trans-unit.target: 侦办～由你操控之生物的力量总和等于或大于8。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·156 | Case of the Trampled Garden | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Solved — Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature. It gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 侦结～每当你攻击时，在目标进行攻击的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·157 | Chalk Outline | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chalk Outline
trans-unit.target: 描画轮廓

trans-unit.resname: MKM·157 | Chalk Outline | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 2/2 white and blue Detective creature token, then investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，派出一个2/2，白蓝双色的侦探衍生生物，然后探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·157 | Chalk Outline | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In your search for a suspect, never forget that the most important person is the victim."\n—Ezrim, Agency chief
trans-unit.target: 「在追寻嫌犯时，绝对不要忘记受害人才是最重要的。」 ～魔调局局长伊泽霖

trans-unit.resname: MKM·158 | Culvert Ambusher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Culvert Ambusher
trans-unit.target: 阴沟伏击兽

trans-unit.resname: MKM·158 | Culvert Ambusher | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Culvert Ambusher enters the battlefield or is turned face up, target creature blocks this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 当阴沟伏击兽进战场或翻回正面时，目标生物本回合若能进行阻挡，则必须阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·158 | Culvert Ambusher | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Disguise {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{4}{G}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·158 | Culvert Ambusher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The bite at the end of the tunnel.
trans-unit.target: 历经隧道险，苦尽血口来。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·159 | Fanatical Strength | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fanatical Strength
trans-unit.target: 狂热驱力

trans-unit.resname: MKM·159 | Fanatical Strength | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+3/+3且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·159 | Fanatical Strength | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What is this? An ambush or a staring contest?" Kaya taunted. As if in answer, the robed figure lunged forward.
trans-unit.target: 「现在是干吗？你是要动手还只是盯着看？」卡娅讥讽道。斗篷覆体的身影猛然挥击，算是给出了回应。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·160 | Flourishing Bloom-Kin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flourishing Bloom-Kin
trans-unit.target: 茁壮花身

trans-unit.resname: MKM·160 | Flourishing Bloom-Kin | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flourishing Bloom-Kin gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个树林，茁壮花身便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·160 | Flourishing Bloom-Kin | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Disguise {4}{G}

trans-unit.resname: MKM·160 | Flourishing Bloom-Kin | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Flourishing Bloom-Kin is turned face up, search your library for up to two Forest cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当茁壮花身翻回正面时，从你牌库中搜寻至多两张树林牌并展示之。将其中一张横置放进战场，另一张则置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·161 | Get a Leg Up | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Get a Leg Up
trans-unit.target: 更上层楼

trans-unit.resname: MKM·161 | Get a Leg Up | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains reach.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物获得延势异能，且你每操控一个生物，它便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·161 | Get a Leg Up | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Apologies for using you like a stepladder. On the other hand, thank you, you're a wonderful stepladder!"
trans-unit.target: 「抱歉把你当成梯子一样到处踩。话说回来，也还得谢谢你，你当梯子真不赖！」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·162 | Glint Weaver | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.resname: MKM·162 | Glint Weaver | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Glint Weaver enters the battlefield, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then you gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 当烁亮织网蛛进战场时，将三个+1/+1指示物分配给一个，两个或三个目标生物，然后你获得若干生命，其数量等同于由你操控之生物中的最大防御力。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·162 | Glint Weaver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The spider just loved how the gems twinkled, and the high-class prey they attracted.
trans-unit.target: 这蜘蛛喜欢宝石闪闪发光的样子，以及宝石吸引来的高雅猎物。

trans-unit.target: 伪装{5}{G}{G}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·163 | Greenbelt Radical | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: MKM·164 | Hard-Hitting Question | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·164 | Hard-Hitting Question | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Keen eyes and an analytical mind are some of a detective's most important tools. As is a mean left hook."\n—Senior Inspector Holjo
trans-unit.target: 「敏锐目光跟灵活大脑是侦探不可或缺的重要工具。强劲勾拳也是其中之一。」 ～资深巡检员何勒乔

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap Hedge Whisperer during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择于你的重置步骤中不重置树篱语者。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·165 | Hedge Whisperer | Card Text: Paragraph 2

Activate only as a sorcery. (To collect evidence 4, exile cards with total mana value 4 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {3}{G}，{tap}，搜证4：于树篱语者持续横置的时段内，目标由你操控的地成为5/5绿色，具敏捷异能的植物／野猪生物。它仍然是地。只能于法术时机起动。（搜证4的流程，是从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到4或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.target: 当面匿踪

trans-unit.resname: MKM·166 | Hide in Plain Sight | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library, cloak two of them, and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌，匿伏其中两张，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。（匿伏某牌的流程，是将该牌牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·166 | Hide in Plain Sight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The trees look beautiful... until they look back.
trans-unit.target: 这树很好看…直到它们看回来。

trans-unit.target: 当凶手在侧进战场时，派出一个1/1白色人类衍生生物，一个1/1蓝色人鱼衍生生物和一个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。然后私下选择人类，人鱼或鬼怪。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·167 | A Killer Among Us | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice A Killer Among Us, Reveal the chosen creature type: If target attacking creature token is the chosen type, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲凶手在侧，展示所选生物类别：如果目标进行攻击的衍生生物为该类别，则在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物且其获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·178 | They Went This Way | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Running doesn't prove guilt, but innocent people don't typically flee into the North Ridge Forest."\n—Alst of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「虽说并非只有罪犯才会逃跑，但一般无辜的人逃命不会躲进北脊林里。」 ～寻路侦探社的阿莱斯特

trans-unit.resname: MKM·179 | Topiary Panther | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Topiary Panther
trans-unit.target: 绿雕猎豹

trans-unit.resname: MKM·179 | Topiary Panther | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: MKM·179 | Topiary Panther | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 循环基本地{1}{G}（{1}{G}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·179 | Topiary Panther | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The gardens around Karlov Manor are oddly bereft of birdsong.
trans-unit.target: 奇怪的是，卡洛夫庄园周围的花圃内都听不见鸟鸣。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·180 | Tunnel Tipster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tunnel Tipster
trans-unit.target: 隧道情报贩

trans-unit.resname: MKM·180 | Tunnel Tipster | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if a face-down creature entered the battlefield under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Tunnel Tipster.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有牌面朝下的生物在你操控下进战场，则在隧道情报贩上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·180 | Tunnel Tipster | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.
trans-unit.target: {tap}：加{G}。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·180 | Tunnel Tipster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When your perp goes underground, I know where to find 'em."
trans-unit.target: 「如果你要抓的人往地底逃了的话，我知道能在哪里找到他。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·181 | Undergrowth Recon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Undergrowth Recon
trans-unit.target: 矮丛侦察

trans-unit.resname: MKM·181 | Undergrowth Recon | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将目标地牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·181 | Undergrowth Recon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I want eyes on the scene of the crime, day and night. I have a feeling our killer won't be able to resist coming back."\n—Thare of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「我要有人日夜盯着这犯罪现场。我感觉凶手会忍不住再回来看看。」 ～寻路侦探社的特伐

trans-unit.resname: MKM·182 | Vengeful Creeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vengeful Creeper
trans-unit.target: 复仇匍行怪

trans-unit.resname: MKM·182 | Vengeful Creeper | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Disguise {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{5}{G}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·182 | Vengeful Creeper | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Vengeful Creeper is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当复仇匍行怪翻回正面时，消灭目标由对手操控的神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·182 | Vengeful Creeper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Seeking intact evidence in the Rubblebelt is a fool's errand.
trans-unit.target: 要在瓦砾区找到完好无损的证据，简直就是异想天开。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·183 | Vitu-Ghazi Inspector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vitu-Ghazi Inspector
trans-unit.target: 维图加基巡检员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·183 | Vitu-Ghazi Inspector | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may collect evidence 6. (Exile cards with total mana value 6 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以搜证6，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。（从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到6或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·183 | Vitu-Ghazi Inspector | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Reach
trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.resname: MKM·183 | Vitu-Ghazi Inspector | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Vitu-Ghazi Inspector enters the battlefield, if evidence was collected, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当维图加基巡检员进战场时，若已搜证，则在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·184 | Agrus Kos, Spirit of Justice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agrus Kos, Spirit of Justice
trans-unit.target: 正义之魂阿固寇斯

trans-unit.resname: MKM·184 | Agrus Kos, Spirit of Justice | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Double strike, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 连击，警戒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·184 | Agrus Kos, Spirit of Justice | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Agrus Kos, Spirit of Justice enters the battlefield or attacks, choose up to one target creature. If it's suspected, exile it. Otherwise, suspect it. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 每当正义之魂阿固寇斯进战场或攻击时，选择至多一个目标生物。如果它已遭疑，则将它放逐。若否，则怀疑它。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·184 | Agrus Kos, Spirit of Justice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Eventually I'll give retirement another shot. But not today."
trans-unit.target: 「有朝一日我会再考虑是否要退休。不过不是今天。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·185 | Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth
trans-unit.target: 大侦探阿奎斯波费

trans-unit.resname: MKM·185 | Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·185 | Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当大侦探阿奎斯波费进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·185 | Alquist Proft, Master Sleuth | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {X}{W}{U}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a Clue: You draw X cards and gain X life.
trans-unit.target: {X}{W}{U}{U}，{tap}，牺牲一个线索：你抓X张牌且获得X点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·186 | Anzrag, the Quake-Mole | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anzrag, the Quake-Mole
trans-unit.target: 地动鼹鼠安札格

trans-unit.resname: MKM·186 | Anzrag, the Quake-Mole | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Anzrag, the Quake-Mole becomes blocked, untap each creature you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当地动鼹鼠安札格被阻挡时，重置所有由你操控的生物。在此战斗阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·186 | Anzrag, the Quake-Mole | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{R}{R}{G}{G}: Anzrag must be blocked each combat this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}{R}{G}{G}：本回合中，安札格每次战斗若能被阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·186 | Anzrag, the Quake-Mole | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His claws tear at the foundations of civilization.
trans-unit.target: 他的利爪撕扯文明根基。

trans-unit.source: Assassin's Trophy
trans-unit.target: 杀手留念

trans-unit.source: Destroy target permanent an opponent controls. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·187 | Assassin's Trophy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Not just any floriculturist can grow this caliber of nightbloom. We're looking for a rooftop hothouse with quite particular conditions."\n—Dr. A of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「不是随随便便哪个花匠都能种好这么大棵的月下美人。得有特定设施的屋顶暖房才能办到。」 ～寻路侦探社的妮乌

trans-unit.resname: MKM·188 | Aurelia, the Law Above | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, haste
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: MKM·188 | Aurelia, the Law Above | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手以三个或更多生物攻击时，你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·188 | Aurelia, the Law Above | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手以五个或更多生物攻击时，苍天铁律欧瑞梨向你的每位对手各造成3点伤害且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·189 | Blood Spatter Analysis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blood Spatter Analysis
trans-unit.target: 血迹分析

trans-unit.resname: MKM·189 | Blood Spatter Analysis | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Blood Spatter Analysis enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当血迹分析进战场时，它向目标由对手操控的生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·189 | Blood Spatter Analysis | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures die, mill a card and put a bloodstain counter on Blood Spatter Analysis. Then sacrifice it if it has five or more bloodstain counters on it. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个生物死去时，磨一张牌并在血迹分析上放置一个血迹指示物。然后如果其上有五个或更多血迹指示物，则牺牲它。当你如此作时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·190 | Break Out | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Break Out
trans-unit.target: 破墙而出

trans-unit.resname: MKM·190 | Break Out | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them. If that card has mana value 2 or less, you may put it onto the battlefield and it gains haste until end of turn. If you didn't put the revealed card onto the battlefield this way, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张生物牌。如果该牌的法术力值等于或小于2，则你可以将它放进战场且它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。若你未以此法将所展示的牌放进战场，则将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·190 | Break Out | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hey, kiddo. Your ride's here."
trans-unit.target: 「喂，小子。有人来接你了。」

If that card has mana value 2 or less, you may put it onto the battlefield and it gains haste until end of turn. If you didn't put the revealed card onto the battlefield this way, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张生物牌。如果该牌的法术力值等于或小于2，则你可以将它放进战场且它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。若你未以此法将所展示的牌放进战场，则将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·194 | Curious Cadaver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you said I could learn a lot from a corpse, I have to admit I wasn't expecting it to lecture me on forensic procedure."\n—Kellan, to Ezrim
trans-unit.target: 「我必须说，当你告诉我尸体能教会我很多的时候，我绝没想过是尸体亲自来跟我讲法证规程。」 ～凯澜告诉伊泽霖

trans-unit.source: Choose one or both —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项或都选～

trans-unit.resname: MKM·195 | Deadly Complication | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: • Put a +1/+1 counter on target suspected creature you control. You may have it become no longer suspected.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·195 | Deadly Complication | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Teysa's security was unrivaled. Etrata was locked up. Kaya was left with nothing but multiplying questions... and a dead friend.
trans-unit.target: 泰莎的警卫都是万里挑一。惯犯艾庄塔也已羁押在案。现在摆在卡娅面前的就只剩无尽的问题…和朋友的遗体。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·196 | Detective's Satchel | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 侦探背包

trans-unit.resname: MKM·196 | Detective's Satchel | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: MKM·196 | Detective's Satchel | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: MKM·198 | Doppelgang | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Suspect spotted at the Tin Street Market, Yescu Street entrance. And the Oak Street entrance. And somehow also in Lobar Alley!"\n—Avult of the Foundway Associates

trans-unit.source: Create a 2/2 white and blue Detective creature token. If a creature died this turn, you gain 2 life, surveil 2, then investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 派出一个2/2，白蓝双色的侦探衍生生物。如果本回合中有生物死去，则你获得2点生命，刺探2，然后探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·199 | Drag the Canal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let's gather what we can before the Golgari tidy up the scene."
trans-unit.target: 「在葛加理来收拾之前，证据能搜集多少是多少。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·200 | Etrata, Deadly Fugitive | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Etrata, Deadly Fugitive
trans-unit.target: 夺命逃犯艾庄塔

trans-unit.resname: MKM·200 | Etrata, Deadly Fugitive | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: MKM·200 | Etrata, Deadly Fugitive | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Face-down creatures you control have "{2}{U}{B}: Turn this creature face up. If you can't, exile it, then you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且牌面朝下的生物具有「{2}{U}{B}：将此生物翻回正面。若你无法如此作，则将它放逐，然后你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·200 | Etrata, Deadly Fugitive | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Assassin you control deals combat damage to an opponent, cloak the top card of that player's library.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的杀手向任一对手造成战斗伤害时，匿伏该牌手的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·201 | Evidence Examiner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evidence Examiner
trans-unit.target: 核证员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·201 | Evidence Examiner | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may collect evidence 4. (Exile cards with total mana value 4 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以搜证4。（从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到4或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·201 | Evidence Examiner | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you collect evidence, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当你搜证时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·202 | Ezrim, Agency Chief | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Ezrim, Agency Chief enters the battlefield, investigate twice. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 当魔调局局长伊泽霖进战场时，探查两次。（探查的流程，是派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·202 | Ezrim, Agency Chief | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Ezrim gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or hexproof until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲一个神器：伊泽霖依你的选择获得警戒、系命或辟邪异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 伪装{1}{UB}{UB}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·203 | Faerie Snoop | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 厄时爆炸

trans-unit.resname: MKM·207 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. Then you may discard two cards. When you do, Ill-Timed Explosion deals X damage to each creature, where X is the greatest mana value among cards discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。然后你可以弃两张牌。当你如此作时，厄时爆炸对每个生物各造成X点伤害，X为以此法所弃各牌中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·207 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Only too late did the Agency custodians realize the device had not been inactive—it was just waiting for the right trigger.
trans-unit.target: 当魔调局保管员发现看似静止的装置仍在运行时，一切都为时已晚～它只是在等合适的爆发时机。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·208 | Insidious Roots | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The roots of Vitu-Ghazi allowed Trostani to reach every crack and crevice in the city.
trans-unit.target: 维图加基的繁杂根系，让卓塔妮能自如触及城市中的每道缝隙。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·210 | Judith, Carnage Connoisseur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't make my living hiding the truth, detective. I shout it from the stage."
trans-unit.target: 「侦探先生，隐藏真相可挣不了钱。在台上把它们大声喊出来才行。」

trans-unit.target: 十会盟地脉

trans-unit.resname: MKM·217 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了十会盟地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·217 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋

trans-unit.resname: MKM·218 | Lightning Helix | Card Text

trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋对任意一个目标造成3点伤害且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·218 | Lightning Helix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After heavy casualties in the Phyrexian invasion, the Boros mage-priests trained as many rank-and-file soldiers as possible to wield the Legion's legendary battle magic.
trans-unit.target: 经历非瑞克西亚大侵攻的惨痛伤亡后，波洛斯的法师僧侣开始向普通士兵传授知识，希望有尽可能多的人能够自如运用教团的传奇战斗魔法。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·219 | Meddling Youths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meddling Youths
trans-unit.target: 误时青年

trans-unit.resname: MKM·219 | Meddling Youths | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当你以三个或更多生物攻击时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·219 | Meddling Youths | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, if it isn't mean old Mr. Larchbottom, who's always been so eager to have the only dumpling stall in Oxblood Alley."
trans-unit.target: 「哎呀，这不是臭脾气的老松底先生嘛。你是不是还急着在牛血巷开出一家面点铺？」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·220 | Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact
trans-unit.target: 十会盟尼米捷

trans-unit.resname: MKM·220 | Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, hexproof from multicolored
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反多色辟邪

trans-unit.resname: MKM·220 | Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Guildpact deals combat damage to a player, it deals X damage to any target, target player draws X cards, and you gain X life, where X is the number of different color pairs among permanents you control that are exactly two colors.
trans-unit.target: 每当十会盟尼米捷对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，它对任意一个目标造成X点伤害，目标牌手抓X张牌，且你获得X点生命，X为由你操控且为正好两色的永久物中不同双色色组的种数。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·221 | No More Lies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: No More Lies
trans-unit.target: 终结谎言

trans-unit.resname: MKM·221 | No More Lies | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·221 | No More Lies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Lies fester and flourish in shadow. Our job is to bathe them in light."\n—Ezrim, Agency chief
trans-unit.target: 「黯影之中，谎言会不断腐生滋长。我们的任务便是将其曝露在明光之下。」 ～魔调局局长伊泽霖

trans-unit.resname: MKM·222 | Officious Interrogation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Officious Interrogation
trans-unit.target: 官式讯问

trans-unit.resname: MKM·222 | Officious Interrogation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {W}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{W}{U}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·222 | Officious Interrogation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose any number of target players. Investigate X times, where X is the total number of creatures those players control.
trans-unit.target: 选择任意数量的目标牌手。探查X次，X为由这些牌手操控之生物的总数量。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·222 | Officious Interrogation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No guest was permitted to leave before being questioned in an Azorius verity circle.
trans-unit.target: 每位宾客都要进入俄佐立真相环之中接受讯问，没完成之前不准离开。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·223 | Private Eye | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Private Eye
trans-unit.target: 私家眼探

trans-unit.resname: MKM·223 | Private Eye | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other Detectives you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他侦探得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·223 | Private Eye | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, target Detective can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，目标侦探本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·223 | Private Eye | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Yep. It's a vase, all right."
trans-unit.target: 「是的。这是花瓶，没问题。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·224 | Rakdos, Patron of Chaos | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakdos, Patron of Chaos
trans-unit.target: 混沌护主拉铎司

trans-unit.resname: MKM·224 | Rakdos, Patron of Chaos | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: MKM·224 | Rakdos, Patron of Chaos | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent may sacrifice two nonland, nontoken permanents. If they don't, you draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，目标对手可以牺牲两个非地且非衍生物的永久物。若其未如此作，则你抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·224 | Rakdos, Patron of Chaos | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Finally, a performance worthy of my applause!"
trans-unit.target: 「终于有了一场值得我亲自喝彩的演出！」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·225 | Rakish Scoundrel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rakish Scoundrel
trans-unit.target: 放浪恶棍

trans-unit.resname: MKM·225 | Rakish Scoundrel | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: MKM·225 | Rakish Scoundrel | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Rakish Scoundrel enters the battlefield or is turned face up, target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当放浪恶棍进战场或翻回正面时，目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·225 | Rakish Scoundrel | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Disguise {4}{BG}{BG} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 伪装{4}{BG}{BG}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·226 | Relive the Past | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relive the Past
trans-unit.target: 重现过去

trans-unit.resname: MKM·226 | Relive the Past | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target land card, and up to one target non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. They are 5/5 Elemental creatures in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 将至多一张目标神器牌，至多一张目标地牌和至多一张目标非灵气结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它们是5/5元素生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·226 | Relive the Past | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Many have tried to subjugate Ravnica. All have failed. All will fail."\n—Museum of Ravnican History
trans-unit.target: 「曾有许多势力想要征服拉尼卡。它们过去没办到。将来也办不到。」 ～拉尼卡历史博物馆

trans-unit.resname: MKM·227 | Repulsive Mutation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Repulsive Mutation
trans-unit.target: 排斥变异

trans-unit.resname: MKM·227 | Repulsive Mutation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Then counter up to one target spell unless its controller pays mana equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 在目标由你操控的生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物。然后除非至多一个目标咒语的操控者支付等同于由你操控之生物中最大力量的法术力，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·227 | Repulsive Mutation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Remind me to send the biomancer team a gift basket."\n—Olana, Simic field researcher
trans-unit.target: 「记得提醒我要给生机术士组送篮礼品。」 ～析米克勘验学者欧兰纳

trans-unit.resname: MKM·228 | Riftburst Hellion | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 伪装{4}{RG}{RG}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·228 | Riftburst Hellion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like any Ravnican denizen, it decided to visit Plaza West for lunch.
trans-unit.target: 跟其他拉尼卡市民一样，它也决定去西城广场用午餐。

trans-unit.target: 烙符杂耍客

trans-unit.resname: MKM·229 | Rune-Brand Juggler | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Rune-Brand Juggler enters the battlefield, suspect up to one target creature you control. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 当烙符杂耍客进战场时，怀疑至多一个目标由你操控的生物。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·229 | Rune-Brand Juggler | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: {3}{B}{R}，牺牲一个已遭疑的生物：目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·229 | Rune-Brand Juggler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Notice: Guests of Hellbender may be exposed to occasional bursts of flame.
trans-unit.target: 警告：参访地狱乐园的游客或会遭受偶发烈焰侵袭。

trans-unit.target: 当血色救助僧翻回正面时，另一个目标由你操控的生物获得系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Shady Informant
trans-unit.target: 可疑线人

trans-unit.resname: MKM·231 | Shady Informant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Shady Informant dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 当可疑线人死去时，它对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·231 | Shady Informant | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: MKM·231 | Shady Informant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rakdos snitches rarely survive to get stitches.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司告密者鲜少活到被发现的时候。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·232 | Soul Search | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soul Search
trans-unit.target: 搜索灵魂

trans-unit.resname: MKM·232 | Soul Search | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. If the card's mana value is 1 or less, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。放逐该牌。如果该牌的法术力值等于或小于1，则派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·232 | Soul Search | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Taking a secret to your grave still doesn't make it safe from the Orzhov.
trans-unit.target: 就算你把秘密带进坟墓里，也还是瞒不过欧佐夫。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·233 | Sumala Sentry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sumala Sentry
trans-unit.target: 索马拉哨卫

trans-unit.resname: MKM·233 | Sumala Sentry | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reach
trans-unit.target: 延势

trans-unit.resname: MKM·233 | Sumala Sentry | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a face-down permanent you control is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on it and a +1/+1 counter on Sumala Sentry.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且牌面朝下的永久物翻回正面时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物且在索马拉哨卫上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·233 | Sumala Sentry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The great meditation garden of Sumala was no place for Ravnica's rising crime wave, and he would keep it that way.
trans-unit.target: 索马拉的大冥想花园仍旧清净，不受拉尼卡日益渐增的犯罪浪潮滋扰；而他意欲继续如此。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·234 | Teysa, Opulent Oligarch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teysa, Opulent Oligarch
trans-unit.target: 阔绰寡头泰莎

trans-unit.resname: MKM·234 | Teysa, Opulent Oligarch | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 死触

trans-unit.resname: MKM·234 | Teysa, Opulent Oligarch | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, investigate for each opponent who lost life this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每有一位本回合中失去过生命的对手，你便探查一次。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·234 | Teysa, Opulent Oligarch | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Clue you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的线索从战场进入坟墓场时，派出一个1/1，白黑双色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·235 | Tin Street Gossip | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tin Street Gossip
trans-unit.target: 锡街多嘴客

trans-unit.resname: MKM·235 | Tin Street Gossip | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·235 | Tin Street Gossip | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast face-down spells or to turn creatures face up.
trans-unit.target: {tap}：加{R}{G}。此法术力只能用来施放牌面朝下的咒语，或是将生物翻回正面。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·235 | Tin Street Gossip | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The lawmages are trying to hush it up, but I'm telling you—the guard didn't fall off that balcony. He was pushed!"
trans-unit.target: 「律法师想要把这件事瞒过去，但我跟你说～守卫不是自己掉下阳台的。他是被人推下去的！」

trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: MKM·236 | Tolsimir, Midnight's Light | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Tolsimir, Midnight's Light enters the battlefield, create Voja Fenstalker, a legendary 5/5 green and white Wolf creature token with trample.
trans-unit.target: 当午夜明光托西密进战场时，派出传奇衍生生物沼行沃亚，其为5/5，绿白双色，具践踏异能的狼。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·236 | Tolsimir, Midnight's Light | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Wolf you control attacks, if Tolsimir attacked this combat, target creature an opponent controls blocks that Wolf this combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的狼攻击时，若托西密本次战斗中攻击过，则目标由对手操控的生物本次战斗若能阻挡该狼，则须如此作。

trans-unit.source: Treacherous Greed
trans-unit.target: 失忠贪欲

trans-unit.resname: MKM·237 | Treacherous Greed | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature that dealt damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个本回合中造成过伤害的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·237 | Treacherous Greed | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards. Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。每位对手各失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·237 | Treacherous Greed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Loot's easy to divide by one.
trans-unit.target: 只剩一人更易分赃。

trans-unit.target: {1}{G}：目标生物获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, collect evidence X, where X is the total mana value of the permanents this spell targets.
trans-unit.target: 搜证X，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用，X为此咒语指定作目标之各永久物的法术力值总和。

trans-unit.source: "The Golgari can read the dead like a newspaper."\n—Taboro of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「葛加理人解析遗体，就跟翻阅报纸一样轻松。」 ～寻路侦探社的莱努瓦梅卡
