trans-unit.resname: MKM·241 | Vannifar, Evolved Enigma | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: MKM·241 | Vannifar, Evolved Enigma | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Cloak a card from your hand. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: •从你手上匿伏一张牌。（将它牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·241 | Vannifar, Evolved Enigma | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Put a +1/+1 counter on each colorless creature you control.
trans-unit.target: •在每个由你操控的无色生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·242 | Warleader's Call | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Warleader's Call
trans-unit.target: 战领召令

trans-unit.resname: MKM·242 | Warleader's Call | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·242 | Warleader's Call | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Warleader's Call deals 1 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你操控下进战场时，战领召令向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·242 | Warleader's Call | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While Aurelia mustered the Boros Legion, Kaya and Kellan raced against the clock, desperate to stave off a war the guilds might not survive.
trans-unit.target: 一边欧瑞梨召集波洛斯教团整军备战，另一边卡娅与凯澜争分夺秒破解案件，竭尽全力要把这场可能会令所有公会同归于尽的战争扼杀在萌芽之中。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·243 | Wispdrinker Vampire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wispdrinker Vampire
trans-unit.target: 饮灵吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: MKM·243 | Wispdrinker Vampire | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·243 | Wispdrinker Vampire | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个力量等于或小于2的生物在你操控下进战场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·243 | Wispdrinker Vampire | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {5}{W}{B}: Creatures you control with power 2 or less gain deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {5}{W}{B}：由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物获得死触与系命异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·244 | Worldsoul's Rage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Worldsoul's Rage
trans-unit.target: 世界之魂怒火

trans-unit.resname: MKM·244 | Worldsoul's Rage | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Worldsoul's Rage deals X damage to any target. Put up to X land cards from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 世界之魂怒火对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。将至多X张地牌从你手上和／或你坟墓场中横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·244 | Worldsoul's Rage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hoarding supplies, profiting from death and destruction, colluding with the invaders—every one of them betrayed Ravnica in its time of greatest need. They all deserved to die. And I'm not done yet!"
trans-unit.target: 「囤物居奇，借灾牟利，勾结外敌～他们所有人都在拉尼卡最需要帮助的时候背叛了这座城市。他们都该死。我还没有完！」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·245 | Yarus, Roar of the Old Gods | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yarus, Roar of the Old Gods
trans-unit.target: 古神之吼雅鲁斯

trans-unit.resname: MKM·245 | Yarus, Roar of the Old Gods | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other creatures you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·245 | Yarus, Roar of the Old Gods | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more face-down creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控且牌面朝下的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·245 | Yarus, Roar of the Old Gods | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a face-down creature you control dies, return it to the battlefield face down under its owner's control if it's a permanent card, then turn it face up.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且牌面朝下的生物死去时，如果它是永久物牌，则将它在其拥有者的操控下牌面朝下地移回战场，然后将它翻回正面。

trans-unit.target: 停止

trans-unit.target: 将至多两张目标在同一坟墓场中的牌从该处放逐。目标牌手获得2点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·247 | Jetsam | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jetsam

trans-unit.resname: MKM·247 | Jetsam | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each opponent mills three cards, then you may cast a spell from each opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各磨三张牌，然后你可以从每位对手的坟墓场中各施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若以此法施放的咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assemble the Players
trans-unit.target: 召集选手

trans-unit.resname: MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may cast a creature spell with power 2 or less from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 限每回合一次，你可以从你牌库顶施放力量等于或小于2的生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One of these people is the mastermind. I wonder, do they still believe they won't be caught?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「案件主谋就藏在这些人当中。我在想，他们是否依然觉得自己能够逍遥法外？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·288 | Auspicious Arrival | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Auspicious Arrival
trans-unit.target: 朗报到来

trans-unit.resname: MKM·288 | Auspicious Arrival | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·288 | Auspicious Arrival | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Azorius are too obsessed with facts to see the truth that knits them together. They'll never solve this case unless I step in."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「俄佐立过于注重个别事证，却看不清将它们串成一体的真相。我要是不出手，他们永远破不了案。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·289 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call a Surprise Witness
trans-unit.target: 突召人证

trans-unit.resname: MKM·289 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a flying counter on it. It's a Spirit in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。在其上放置一个飞行指示物。它额外具有精怪此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·289 | Call a Surprise Witness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Honestly, the real surprise would be if a powerful member of the Orzhov *didn't* hang around after their demise."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target:
「说实话，如果哪个欧佐夫权贵死掉之后没有在现场露脸，那才是意料之外。」
～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·290 | Makeshift Binding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Makeshift Binding
trans-unit.target: 临时束缚

trans-unit.resname: MKM·290 | Makeshift Binding | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Makeshift Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Makeshift Binding leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当临时束缚进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到临时束缚离开战场为止。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·290 | Makeshift Binding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With the treacherous Oba separated from her sisters, I'm hopeful that Trostani will, in some form, eventually recover."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「性情大变的欧芭已脱离姐妹身躯，但我相信卓塔妮最终一定会如常恢复均衡。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·291 | Not on My Watch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Not on My Watch
trans-unit.target: 所视必管

trans-unit.resname: MKM·291 | Not on My Watch | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·291 | Not on My Watch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not so bad working with Etrata. She's taciturn, and she has saved my life twice today."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「跟艾庄塔一起行动也不是坏事。她不太说话，但光今天就救了我两次命。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·292 | On the Job | Card Name
trans-unit.source: On the Job
trans-unit.target: 任务出动

trans-unit.resname: MKM·292 | On the Job | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·292 | On the Job | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Agency's detectives will eliminate the false leads. I will find the truth."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「魔调局侦探会排除错误线索。我会找到真相。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·293 | Deduce | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deduce
trans-unit.target: 常理推断

trans-unit.resname: MKM·293 | Deduce | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw a card. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·293 | Deduce | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Of course! It was all so obvious. I should have made the connection days ago."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「就该如此！这都再明显不过了。我几天前就该把它们都串起来。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.target: 当仙儿飞空进战场时，所结附的生物获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·295 | Fae Flight | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+1/+0且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·296 | Intrude on the Mind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Intrude on the Mind
trans-unit.target: 入侵心灵

trans-unit.resname: MKM·296 | Intrude on the Mind | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Create a 0/0 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying, then put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card put into your graveyard this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌，并分成两堆。由任一对手选择其中一堆。将该堆牌置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。派出一个0/0无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物，然后每以此法将一张牌置入你的坟墓场，便在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·297 | Reenact the Crime | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reenact the Crime
trans-unit.target: 重现罪行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·297 | Reenact the Crime | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile target nonland card in a graveyard that was put there from anywhere this turn. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标在坟墓场中的非地牌，且须为本回合中从任何区域置入该处者。将它复制。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·297 | Reenact the Crime | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As I suspected, Kylox had prepared a secret exit. But the question remains: Did he escape his assailants or was he taken against his will?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「跟我想的一样，奇洛兹果然留了一道密门。不过谜团还没解开：他是自行逃出还是被人掳走？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·298 | Unauthorized Exit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unauthorized Exit
trans-unit.target: 擅自脱逃

trans-unit.resname: MKM·298 | Unauthorized Exit | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Surveil 1.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。刺探1。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·298 | Unauthorized Exit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Azorius will be annoyed with me for breaking out their star suspect, but what else is new."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「我带着俄佐立的头号嫌疑犯脱逃，他们看我更不顺眼，一切就老样子。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·299 | It Doesn't Add Up | Card Name
trans-unit.source: It Doesn't Add Up
trans-unit.target: 事理不通

trans-unit.resname: MKM·299 | It Doesn't Add Up | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Suspect it.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。怀疑它。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·299 | It Doesn't Add Up | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Etrata claims she has no memory of committing the murder. Somehow, I believe she's telling the truth."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「艾庄塔声称她对自己犯下这桩血案毫无记忆。我总觉得她说的是真话。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·300 | Murder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murder
trans-unit.target: 谋杀

trans-unit.resname: MKM·300 | Murder | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·300 | Murder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The manner of death, the way the body was displayed, the carefully arranged guild emblems . . . someone is trying to send a message."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「离奇的死亡方式、怪异的遗体姿态、刻意摆齐的公会徽记…有人想藉此传递什么讯息。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Slice from the Shadows
trans-unit.target: 暗中杀出

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Something about Massacre Girl's brazen attack doesn't make sense. Why would the Cult of Rakdos be involved at all?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「杀戮女郎这样明目张胆地袭击我，怎么想都不对劲。拉铎司宗派为什么一定要来蹚这趟浑水？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·302 | Soul Enervation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soul Enervation
trans-unit.target: 灵魂衰弱

trans-unit.resname: MKM·302 | Soul Enervation | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: MKM·302 | Soul Enervation | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Soul Enervation enters the battlefield, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当灵魂衰弱进战场时，目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·302 | Soul Enervation | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·303 | Anzrag's Rampage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anzrag's Rampage
trans-unit.target: 安札格的狂愤

trans-unit.resname: MKM·303 | Anzrag's Rampage | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all artifacts you don't control, then exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts that were put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn. You may put a creature card exiled this way onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有不由你操控的神器，然后放逐你牌库顶的X张牌，X为本回合中从战场进入坟墓场的神器数量。你可以将以此法放逐的一张生物牌放进战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·304 | The Chase Is On | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If she's innocent, as she so vehemently claims, why did she run?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「她既然如此坚称无辜，那又为什么要逃？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·316 | Worldsoul's Rage | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MKM·415 | Drag the Canal | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Create a 2/2 white and blue Detective creature token. If a creature died this turn, you gain 2 life, surveil 2, then investigate.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个2/2，白蓝双色的侦探衍生生物。如果本回合中有生物死去，则你获得2点生命，刺探2，然后探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·415 | Drag the Canal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let's gather what we can before the Golgari tidy up the scene."
trans-unit.target: 「在葛加理来收拾之前，证据能搜集多少是多少。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·416 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ill-Timed Explosion
trans-unit.target: 厄时爆炸

trans-unit.resname: MKM·416 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. Then you may discard two cards. When you do, Ill-Timed Explosion deals X damage to each creature, where X is the greatest mana value among cards discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。然后你可以弃两张牌。当你如此作时，厄时爆炸对每个生物各造成X点伤害，X为以此法所弃各牌中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·416 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Only too late did the Agency custodians realize the device had not been inactive—it was just waiting for the right trigger.
trans-unit.target: 当魔调局保管员发现看似静止的装置仍在运行时，一切都为时已晚～它只是在等合适的爆发时机。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·417 | Kylox's Voltstrider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kylox's Voltstrider
trans-unit.target: 奇洛兹的电行械

trans-unit.resname: MKM·417 | Kylox's Voltstrider | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Collect evidence 6: Kylox's Voltstrider becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Whenever Kylox's Voltstrider attacks, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among cards exiled with it. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead. Crew 2
trans-unit.target: 搜证6：奇洛兹的电行械成为神器生物直到回合结束。 每当奇洛兹的电行械攻击时，你可以从以其放逐的牌之中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语。 如果该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库底。 搭载2

trans-unit.source: Leyline of the Guildpact
trans-unit.target: 十会盟地脉

trans-unit.resname: MKM·418 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If Leyline of the Guildpact is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了十会盟地脉，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·418 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each nonland permanent you control is all colors.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控的非地永久物均是五色。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·418 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地均额外具有所有基本地类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·419 | Relive the Past | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relive the Past
trans-unit.target: 重现过去

trans-unit.resname: MKM·419 | Relive the Past | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target land card, and up to one target non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. They are 5/5 Elemental creatures in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 将至多一张目标神器牌，至多一张目标地牌和至多一张目标非灵气结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它们是5/5元素生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·419 | Relive the Past | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Many have tried to subjugate Ravnica. All have failed. All will fail."\n—Museum of Ravnican History
trans-unit.target: 「曾有许多势力想要征服拉尼卡。它们过去没办到。将来也办不到。」 ～拉尼卡历史博物馆

trans-unit.target: 失忠贪欲

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature that dealt damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个本回合中造成过伤害的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·420 | Treacherous Greed | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards. Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。每位对手各失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·420 | Treacherous Greed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Loot's easy to divide by one.
trans-unit.target: 只剩一人更易分赃。

trans-unit.target: 搜证X，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用，X为此咒语指定作目标之各永久物的法术力值总和。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·421 | Urgent Necropsy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target creature, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 消灭至多一个目标神器，至多一个目标生物，至多一个目标结界和至多一个目标鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·421 | Urgent Necropsy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Golgari can read the dead like a newspaper."\n—Taboro of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「葛加理人解析遗体，就跟翻阅报纸一样轻松。」 ～寻路侦探社的莱努瓦梅卡
